lead_paragraph: A report in the Bats baseball notebook on Sunday about the Colorado Rockies, who have been playing better baseball after a terrible start this season, misstated the number of games the team won late last season to force a one-game playoff with the San Diego Padres for a National League postseason berth. It was 13 of 14 — not 14 of 15.
